content.question: Consider a population with population proportion <math alttext="p" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mi>p</mi></mrow></mstyle></math>, and a sample from the population with sample proportion <math alttext="p hat" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mover><mrow><mi>p</mi></mrow><mrow><mo>^</mo></mrow></mover></mrow></mstyle></math>. Which of the following describes the purpose of the one-sample <math alttext="z" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mi>z</mi></mrow></mstyle></math>-test?

choices.label: To estimate the value of <math alttext="p hat" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mover><mrow><mi>p</mi></mrow><mrow><mo>^</mo></mrow></mover></mrow></mstyle></math>
To estimate the value of <math alttext="p" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mi>p</mi></mrow></mstyle></math>
To estimate a margin of error for <math alttext="p hat" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mover><mrow><mi>p</mi></mrow><mrow><mo>^</mo></mrow></mover></mrow></mstyle></math>

To estimate the probability of observing a value as extreme as <math alttext="p hat" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mover><mrow><mi>p</mi></mrow><mrow><mo>^</mo></mrow></mover></mrow></mstyle></math> given <math alttext="p" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mi>p</mi></mrow></mstyle></math>

To estimate the probability of observing a value as extreme as <math alttext="p" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mi>p</mi></mrow></mstyle></math> given <math alttext="p hat" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mover><mrow><mi>p</mi></mrow><mrow><mo>^</mo></mrow></mover></mrow></mstyle></math>

content.answer: To estimate the probability of observing a value as extreme as <math alttext="p hat" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mover><mrow><mi>p</mi></mrow><mrow><mo>^</mo></mrow></mover></mrow></mstyle></math> given <math alttext="p" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mi>p</mi></mrow></mstyle></math>

topic.text: 6.4: Setting Up a Test for a Population Proportion

skill.text: Skill 1.E: Identify an appropriate inference method for significance tests.
